name: databricks
title: databricks
description: Extension to interact with your databricks account and workspaces
author: stelo

commands.name: workflows
commands.title: Workflows
commands.description: Manage jobs for your databricks workspaces

commands.name: delta-live-tables
commands.title: Delta Live Tables
commands.description: Manage Delta Live Table pipelines for your workspaces

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
